GSD.product_version: versions from v4.11 to before v5.10.134
GSD.description:
udp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_udp_l3mdev_accept.

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.134 by commit fcaef69c79ec222e55643e666b80b221e70fa6a8, it was introduced in version v4.11 by commit 63a6fff353d01da5a22b72670c434bf12fa0e3b8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: udp: Fix a data-race around sysctl_udp_l3mdev_accept.
